meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7837.

td.p: Greg Antoine, a programmer from Miami, Florida
Jen Aronoff, an attorney from Chicago, Illinois
Alex Schmidt, a writer and comedian from Pasadena, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,798)

tr.td: A BOOK BY ITS COVER
GREEK LETTER, PLEASE
WHAT TREE AM I?
TV FOR SHORT
FILL IN THE PHRASE
CHRISTIANE AMANPOUR
(Christiane Amanpour: I'm Christiane Amanpour, reporting on a career devoted to bringing viewers the news.)
